overview:
Bill joined Imaginova in August 2002 as Vice President and Publisher of Space News. He is responsible for all advertising and circulation management for Space News as well as business development initiatives for the Trade Publishing division.

Prior to Imaginova, Bill was the Director of Business Development at Cahners Business Information. Previously, he was Vice President of Sales, Marketing and Business Development for FRANDATA Corporation, a business information and data services company, and Vice President of Business Development for CareerBuilder.com. Earlier in his career, Bill worked as an Associate Publisher and an Ad Sales Executive for Government Computer News, EDN Magazine and Electronic Engineering Times.

Bill received his Bachelor of Science degree from Springfield College.
